name: Daganronpa style game - Demo
description:
A famous tv program inspired by Alice in Wonderland has a clandestine part in which players must fight for their lives and survive until the end if they want to become the number one in their fields!

PD: For the pipes puzzle you can only open 2 pipes at the same time! And in case you need to move is with WASD!

PD1: If you just want to see the full demo, you can watch the youtube link!
